doc:
Hal Gordon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hal_Gordon 0 Hal Gordon (1894–1946) was a British film actor. A character actor, he appeared in over 90 films in both comic and straight roles. He started off as a lawyer's clerk but finding it dull he decided on the stage, making his music hall debut in 1912. He toured England and South Africa in pantomime and comedy before entering films in 1928, his first being Adam's Apple. Hal_Gordon ( 1894 – 1946 ) was a_British_film_actor . A_character_actor , he appeared in over_90_films in both_comic_and_straight_roles . He started off as a_lawyer 's_clerk but finding it dull he decided on the_stage , making his_music_hall_debut in 1912 . He toured England and South_Africa in pantomime_and_comedy before entering films in 1928 , his_first being Adam 's_Apple .
